# KYC and third-party screening service

**Managed Services**

Discover how our Managed Services can help you manage risk, reduce your cost
of compliance and free up time to focus on strategic business priorities.

##  **Request details**

Overview

  1. Overview
  2. Features & benefits
  3. How it works
  4. Find out more

Request details

##  Why choose **  Managed Services? **

Increasing challenges related to risk management, compliance costs and
evolving regulatory requirements have placed an operational burden on
regulated firms and corporate organisations, who are looking to strike a
balance between focusing on quality compliance expenditures and controlling
costs.

Managed service is the practice of outsourcing the responsibility for
maintaining a range of processes and functions. Whether you need help with KYC
screening, remediation and ongoing monitoring or you are looking to onboard
and monitor a new third-party, you can outsource these processes to us. Our
expert teams can help you to enhance efficiency and reduce the total costs of
ownership, freeing up your compliance department to focus efforts on other
important strategic activities.

We can help you boost efficiency and lower costs, while you strive for better
regulatory compliance.

Features & benefits

##  What you get with our holistic risk  **Managed Services  **

###  **Single supplier**

We are a single supplier covering three vendor screening management areas:
data, software, and service.

###  **Fast turnaround**

Positive and possible matches escalated to clients as the resolution team
identifies them.

###  **Immediate alerts**

Helps prevent in-progress heightened risk transactions as part of the vendor
screening and management process.

###  **Swift implementation**

We have readily trained resources that can start projects quickly, instead of
clients having to train consultants or staff.

###  **Efficiency**

Free up time and achieve certain compliance actions with fewer resources.

###  **Lower total cost of ownership**

Reduce costs and administrative burden, so that your teams can focus on more
strategic projects.

How it works

##  Ready for fast and effective **  risk management?**

  * Managed onboarding
  * Managed screening

We can help you run a more effective onboarding process. From one-off
screening projects through Refinitiv Due Diligence Centre, our proprietary
technology platform, to handling all the key onboarding tasks on behalf of the
client to run a more efficient and effective onboarding program, we offer
various scopes of Managed Onboarding services.

Outsource your partner, third-party or supplier onboarding program to our
Managed Services Risk Content Operations team. By outsourcing key onboarding
tasks to our team, you can:

  * Ensure partners and suppliers consistently undergo review before engagement
  * Reduce the administrative burden for your teams and focus more time on strategic priorities
  * Establish a stronger channel or supplier ecosystem
  * Process a larger volume of partners, third parties, or suppliers
  * Reduce onboarding cycle times

A managed KYC risk screening service highlights positive and possible matches
for any customer identification programme.

Our  team can screen large batches of your third parties and customers against
Refinitiv World-Check database covering Sanctions, Politically Exposed Persons
(PEPs), State-Owned/State-Controlled Entities, Law Enforcement and Regulatory
Enforcement lists.  This cost-effective solution will allow you to reduce
false positives and identify changes in risk levels in the face of the rapidly
changing landscape.

Outsource your screening tasks to our team if:

  * Lack of skilled resources is hindering your due diligence efforts and negatively impacting customer onboarding
  * You need to manage a growing volume of ongoing screening alerts, which could potentially expose our company to new, unidentified risk
  * Recent regulations mean that you need to re-screen the entire customer base despite insufficient resources
  * You need to screen a large volume of new customers on ongoing basis

Find out more

##  Relevant  **products**

Explore all products

### **World-Check Risk Intelligence**

The World-Check Risk Intelligence database delivers accurate and reliable
information and the tools to help meet due diligence obligations, including
meeting your requirements under KYC (Know Your Customer) screening and anti-
money laundering.

### **Refinitiv Due Diligence**

We offer a range of due diligence services to help organisations manage and
mitigate risk, secure their supply chains and simplify their due diligence
processes.

##  **We're here for you**

Have questions? We're here to help. Talk to a real person and get the answers
that matter most.

  * About Refinitiv

  * Careers at Refinitiv

###  **Need help?**

We want our products to provide you optimum efficiency. Find technical
support, product updates, training sessions and more.

Get support

arrow-right

###  **Get in touch**

For any questions regarding our solutions and services, our customer service
representatives are here to help.

Contact us

arrow-right

###  **Product logins**

Already a Refinitiv customer? Find your product login.

Product logins

##

## Our use of cookies

Refinitiv websites use cookies and similar technologies for various purposes
including functionality, performance, targeting, social media, and for the
proper functioning of websites. The cookies and similar technologies may
include those deployed by third parties for providing services to us and they
may use the same to improve, enhance, and deliver their services to all of
their customers. To access a list of the websites covered by this banner
review the cookie settings. By clicking “Accept all cookies,” you agree to the
storing and reading of cookies and other similar technologies. You can change
your preferences at any time through our Cookie Settings tool. Please read our
Privacy and Cookie Statement.

Cookie settings Reject All  Accept All Cookies

## Privacy Preference Center

This preference center applies to all websites within the www.refinitiv.com
domain/sub-domain group. To view a list of the websites visit
https://www.refinitiv.com/privacy-center-common-domains. When you visit these
websites, information may be stored or retrieved on or from your browser,
mostly in the form of or through cookies (e.g., first-party and third-party)
and similar technologies (e.g., local storage, web beacons, etc.) ("cookies").
This information might be about you, your preferences and/or your device. All
references to "Services" refers to Refinitiv's products, services, websites,
digital properties, platforms, software and applications (including mobile
applications).  
  
The cookies may include those deployed by third parties providing services to
us. These third parties may use these cookies and the information collected in
connection therewith (including information collected on and off of our
websites), for providing services to us and also to improve, enhance and
deliver their services to all of their customers. If you opt-out of, or toggle
off, cookies through this preference center, this action will only apply to
the applicable Refinitiv websites covered by this preference center and will
not impact cookies deployed, and data collection, through non-Refinitiv
websites. In order to opt-out of the tracking and data collection by these
third parties completely, you must either go to the websites for such third
parties to exercise your preference or use the preferences/choices mechanism
available through the advertisements that these third parties may display.  
  
Because we respect your right to privacy, you can choose not to allow some
types of cookies. You can use the features in this preference center to block
or allow these types of cookies. Toggle "on" to allow cookies and toggle "off"
to block specific categories of cookies. For your reference, if the toggle is
blue, then you have allowed cookies and if the toggle is gray, then you have
blocked cookies. Blocking some types of cookies may impact your experience of
the site and the services we are able to offer. A preference cookie will be
set, which will contain your preferences of blocking or allowing cookies.  
  
Please note that if you clear your cookies, the preference cookie will be
deleted for all websites within the group and this will clear your preference
and when you first re-enter or re-access Refinitiv's services (e.g.,
websites), you will be asked to consent to cookies being deployed. When
presented with the option to accept all cookies, if you want to allow or block
certain categories of cookies, you will have to access Refinitiv’s cookie
preference center again to exercise your choice. If you accept all cookies,
then all cookies will deploy.  
  
****  
Privacy Statement and Cookies Policy

Allow All

###  Manage Consent Preferences

#### Strictly Necessary Cookies

Always Active

Strictly Necessary Cookies

These cookies are necessary for websites to function and cannot be switched
off through Refinitiv’s cookie preference center. They are usually only set in
response to actions made by you which amount to a request for services, such
as setting your privacy preferences, logging in or filling in forms.

Cookies Details‎

#### Performance Cookies

Performance Cookies

These cookies collect information, including analytics, about how you use our
Services. Information collected includes, for example, the Internet browsers
and operating systems used, the domain name of the website previously visited,
the number of visits, average duration of visit, actions taken and pages
viewed. These cookies may be used to record or track your interaction and/or
use of our web and/or mobile sites, platforms and/or digital properties.
Performance cookies help us measure the activity on our Services, create
reports and statistics about the performance of our Services, improve the
user-friendliness of the Services and improve the quality of our Services.
These types of cookies typically stay active on your computer until they are
deleted or until the cookie expires (if applicable).

Cookies Details‎

#### Functional Cookies

Functional Cookies

These cookies allow the website to remember information about you (e.g., your
username or ID) and the choices you make (e.g., your language preference, or
the area or region you are in) and provide enhanced, more personalized
features or content to you. These cookies can also be used to remember changes
you have made to text size, fonts, and other customizable parts of web pages.
They may also be used to provide Services you have asked for, such as watching
a video or commenting on a blog. If you do not allow these cookies or if you
toggle these cookies off, then some or all of these Services may not function
properly. These cookies cannot track your browsing activity on other websites.

Cookies Details‎

#### Targeting Cookies

Targeting Cookies

These cookies track browsing habits (on and off of our websites and digital
properties) and are used to deliver targeted (interest-based) advertising.
They are also used to limit the number of times you see an ad and to measure
the effectiveness of advertising campaigns. They remember that you have
visited a website and this information may be shared with other organizations,
such as advertisers and Refinitiv’s advertising partners, who might use it
with information about how you use other websites, including identifying
shared interests and behaviors across groups of users who visit our (and
other) websites. In connection with these types of cookies, your activity may
be tracked or monitored using identifiers (e.g., a cookie ID, other unique
identification numbers). These types of cookies will typically stay on your
computer until they are deleted or until they expire (if applicable).

Cookies Details‎

Benefits

##  How our Pricing and Market Data can benefit you

Pricing data refers to exchange-traded, contributed, and evaluated data for
all financial assets, including commodities, derivatives, equities, fixed
income, foreign exchange, funds, indices, and loans used by financial market
participants.

Our pricing data services provide comprehensive and unique data, analytics,
and news to help you discover more profitable trading opportunities. Our
extensive real-time market coverage across all financial asset classes covers
the widest range of cross-asset market and pricing data. We provide 7.3
million price updates per second for over 90 million instruments, and 2.5
terabytes of real-time pricing daily, with history going back to 1996.  

Categories

##  Browse by key categories in Pricing and Market Data

  * Equities

  * Exchange Traded Funds (ETFs)

  * Fixed Income

  * Foreign Exchange

  * Futures

  * Money Markets

##

## Our use of cookies

Refinitiv websites use cookies and similar technologies for various purposes
including functionality, performance, targeting, social media, and for the
proper functioning of websites. The cookies and similar technologies may
include those deployed by third parties for providing services to us and they
may use the same to improve, enhance, and deliver their services to all of
their customers. To access a list of the websites covered by this banner
review the cookie settings. By clicking “Accept all cookies,” you agree to the
storing and reading of cookies and other similar technologies. You can change
your preferences at any time through our Cookie Settings tool. Please read our
Privacy and Cookie Statement.

Cookie settings Reject All  Accept All Cookies

## Privacy Preference Center

This preference center applies to all websites within the www.refinitiv.com
domain/sub-domain group. To view a list of the websites visit
https://www.refinitiv.com/privacy-center-common-domains. When you visit these
websites, information may be stored or retrieved on or from your browser,
mostly in the form of or through cookies (e.g., first-party and third-party)
and similar technologies (e.g., local storage, web beacons, etc.) ("cookies").
This information might be about you, your preferences and/or your device. All
references to "Services" refers to Refinitiv's products, services, websites,
digital properties, platforms, software and applications (including mobile
applications).  
  
The cookies may include those deployed by third parties providing services to
us. These third parties may use these cookies and the information collected in
connection therewith (including information collected on and off of our
websites), for providing services to us and also to improve, enhance and
deliver their services to all of their customers. If you opt-out of, or toggle
off, cookies through this preference center, this action will only apply to
the applicable Refinitiv websites covered by this preference center and will
not impact cookies deployed, and data collection, through non-Refinitiv
websites. In order to opt-out of the tracking and data collection by these
third parties completely, you must either go to the websites for such third
parties to exercise your preference or use the preferences/choices mechanism
available through the advertisements that these third parties may display.  
  
Because we respect your right to privacy, you can choose not to allow some
types of cookies. You can use the features in this preference center to block
or allow these types of cookies. Toggle "on" to allow cookies and toggle "off"
to block specific categories of cookies. For your reference, if the toggle is
blue, then you have allowed cookies and if the toggle is gray, then you have
blocked cookies. Blocking some types of cookies may impact your experience of
the site and the services we are able to offer. A preference cookie will be
set, which will contain your preferences of blocking or allowing cookies.  
  
Please note that if you clear your cookies, the preference cookie will be
deleted for all websites within the group and this will clear your preference
and when you first re-enter or re-access Refinitiv's services (e.g.,
websites), you will be asked to consent to cookies being deployed. When
presented with the option to accept all cookies, if you want to allow or block
certain categories of cookies, you will have to access Refinitiv’s cookie
preference center again to exercise your choice. If you accept all cookies,
then all cookies will deploy.  
  
****  
Privacy Statement and Cookies Policy

Allow All

###  Manage Consent Preferences

#### Strictly Necessary Cookies

Always Active

Strictly Necessary Cookies

These cookies are necessary for websites to function and cannot be switched
off through Refinitiv’s cookie preference center. They are usually only set in
response to actions made by you which amount to a request for services, such
as setting your privacy preferences, logging in or filling in forms.

Cookies Details‎

#### Performance Cookies

Performance Cookies

These cookies collect information, including analytics, about how you use our
Services. Information collected includes, for example, the Internet browsers
and operating systems used, the domain name of the website previously visited,
the number of visits, average duration of visit, actions taken and pages
viewed. These cookies may be used to record or track your interaction and/or
use of our web and/or mobile sites, platforms and/or digital properties.
Performance cookies help us measure the activity on our Services, create
reports and statistics about the performance of our Services, improve the
user-friendliness of the Services and improve the quality of our Services.
These types of cookies typically stay active on your computer until they are
deleted or until the cookie expires (if applicable).

Cookies Details‎

#### Functional Cookies

Functional Cookies

These cookies allow the website to remember information about you (e.g., your
username or ID) and the choices you make (e.g., your language preference, or
the area or region you are in) and provide enhanced, more personalized
features or content to you. These cookies can also be used to remember changes
you have made to text size, fonts, and other customizable parts of web pages.
They may also be used to provide Services you have asked for, such as watching
a video or commenting on a blog. If you do not allow these cookies or if you
toggle these cookies off, then some or all of these Services may not function
properly. These cookies cannot track your browsing activity on other websites.

Cookies Details‎

#### Targeting Cookies

Targeting Cookies

These cookies track browsing habits (on and off of our websites and digital
properties) and are used to deliver targeted (interest-based) advertising.
They are also used to limit the number of times you see an ad and to measure
the effectiveness of advertising campaigns. They remember that you have
visited a website and this information may be shared with other organizations,
such as advertisers and Refinitiv’s advertising partners, who might use it
with information about how you use other websites, including identifying
shared interests and behaviors across groups of users who visit our (and
other) websites. In connection with these types of cookies, your activity may
be tracked or monitored using identifiers (e.g., a cookie ID, other unique
identification numbers). These types of cookies will typically stay on your
computer until they are deleted or until they expire (if applicable).

Cookies Details‎
